name: Certified in Cybersecurity (CC)
description: The CC credential validates a grasp of fundamental cyber security principles and skills, proving their job readiness to organisations and helping to build a stronger line of defence.

name: Google AI Essentials
description: Google AI Essentials is a self-paced, beginner course teaching foundational AI skills to boost workplace productivity.

name: Security+ (Coming Soon)
description: CompTIA Security+ is a globally recognized, vendor-neutral certification that validates the baseline skills needed to perform core cybersecurity functions.
